mapper.select:
SELECT TFD.ID, TFD.SAVEPATH, TFD.CREATEOPERATORID, TFD.ENCODING, TFD.FILENAME, TFD.VCID, TFD.ORGANIZATIONID, TFD.SYSTEMID, TFD.TYPE, TFD.CREATEDATE, TFD.SERVICETYPE, TFD.LASTUPDATEOPERATORID, TFD.LASTUPDATEDATE FROM CORE_FILE_DEFINITION TFD WHERE
AND TFD.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CORE_FILE_DEFINITION ( ID, SAVEPATH, CREATEOPERATORID, ENCODING, FILENAME, VCID, ORGANIZATIONID, SYSTEMID, TYPE, CREATEDATE, SERVICETYPE, LASTUPDATEOPERATORID, LASTUPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{savePath}, #{createOperatorId}, #{encoding}, #{filename}, #{vcid}, #{organizationId}, #{systemId}, #{type}, #{createDate}, #{serviceType}, #{lastUpdateOperatorId}, #{lastUpdateDate} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM CORE_FILE_DEFINITION WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE CORE_FILE_DEFINITION
SAVEPATH = #{savePath,javaType=java.lang.String},
CREATEOPERATORID = #{createOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
ENCODING = #{encoding,javaType=java.lang.String},
FILENAME = #{filename,javaType=java.lang.String},
VCID = #{vcid,javaType=java.lang.String},
ORGANIZATIONID = #{organizationId,javaType=java.lang.String},
SYSTEMID = #{systemId,javaType=java.lang.String},
TYPE = #{type,javaType=java.lang.String},
CREATEDATE = #{createDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
SERVICETYPE = #{serviceType,javaType=java.lang.String},
LASTUPDATEOPERATORID = #{lastUpdateOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
LASTUPDATEDATE = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
WHERE ID = #{id}
